title: Omae no Subete wo Ubau Made
description: Out of the blue, the new president, Taiga, suddenly ordered Amami Kei to become his secretary. Though confused, Kei reluctantly agree but upon meeting Taiga, Kei  was shocked to see the person who was responsible for his trauma way back from high school!  Kei immediately rejected Taiga’s proposal but Taiga couldn’t take the rejection well. And so starts the love pursuit relentlessly!
